level.heading: Penalties.
level.text: Any lender who wilfully violates any provision of this chapter shall, upon conviction thereof, be fined not more than $1,000 or imprisoned for not more than 1 year, or both.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 5-62, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 28-3301.
